languages.text: {n}Помолчав, инквизитор веско изрекает:{/n} "Надеюсь, вы были достаточно тщательны в этом вопросе. В противном случае вас ждет ответственность".
{n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."
languages.original_text: {n}Помолчав, инквизитор веско изрекает:{/n} "Надеюсь, вы были достаточно тщательны в этом вопросе. В противном случае вас ждет ответственность".

traits.locale_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you are successful in this endeavour. Otherwise, you will be called to account."
{n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you are successful in this endeavour. Otherwise, you will be called to account."
{n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you are successful in this endeavour. If you are not, you will be called to account."

{n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."
{n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

languages.text: {n}カルカサルは間を置いてから厳かに語る。{/n}「せいぜい十分に手を尽くすことだ。さもなくば、その責任を問われるぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}カルカサルは間を置いてから厳かに語る。{/n}「せいぜい十分に手を尽くすことだ。さもなくば、その責任を問われるぞ」

languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

languages.text: {n}他顿了顿，随后以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“我希望你真的做好了万全防范。否则，你将承担一切罪责。”
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}他顿了顿，随后以沉重的声音开了口。{/n}“我希望你真的做好了万全防范。否则，你将承担一切罪责。”

languages.text: {n}Se detiene antes de hablar en tono severo:{/n} «Espero que su labor fuera suficientemente meticulosa. De lo contrario, tendrá que responder de sus acciones».
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se detiene antes de hablar en tono severo:{/n} «Espero que su labor fuera suficientemente meticulosa. De lo contrario, tendrá que responder de sus acciones».

languages.text: {n}Il laisse passer quelques instants avant de répondre sur un ton grave :{/n} « Espérons que vous avez raison. Dans le cas contraire, vous aurez des comptes à nous rendre. »
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il laisse passer quelques instants avant de répondre sur un ton grave :{/n} « Espérons que vous avez raison. Dans le cas contraire, vous aurez des comptes à nous rendre. »

languages.text: {n}Er macht eine Pause und sagt dann todernst:{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr wart gründlich genug. Denn falls nicht, werdet Ihr zur Verantwortung gezogen."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er macht eine Pause und sagt dann todernst:{/n} "Ich hoffe, Ihr wart gründlich genug. Denn falls nicht, werdet Ihr zur Verantwortung gezogen."

languages.text: {n}Bir süre duraksıyor, ardından ciddi bir tavırla belirtiyor.{/n} "Umarım çabaların yeterli olur. Eğer olmazsa hesabı senden sorulacaktır."
languages.original_text: {n}He pauses before saying gravely,{/n} "I hope you were sufficiently thorough. If you were not, you will be called to account."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir süre duraksıyor, ardından ciddi bir tavırla belirtiyor:{/n} "Umarım çabaların yeterli olur. Eğer olmazsa hesabı senden sorulacaktır."
